institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Continuing employment incentive payment and operating rules/Article 8 (On-site inspection)
contents: Article 8 (On-site inspection) ① If it is difficult to determine whether the incentive payment requirements under Article 6 are established based on only the application documents under Article 5 and the supplementary documents under Article 7, the Chairman shall visit the employment or experience workplace of the applicant for payment and visit the actual workplace. An on-site inspection may be conducted to confirm availability, etc., ② If an on-site inspection is conducted pursuant to paragraph 1, the results must be recorded in Form No. 4.
